Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory77.jpg'}
{3: 'The skies are pitch black, the chill of the night wind threatening to rob her of every last bit of warmth she has.'}
{3: 'She reaches out her hand trying to catch a glimpse of the moonlight spilling over, yet her hand does nothing other than blocking her own sight.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "Well, doesn't seem like I stand any chance to win.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lamia lowers her hand and lies flat on the edge of the rooftop, knowing that she can try no more.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'This is bad. This is really bad. Really really bad...', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "Can't you be quiet for a second?"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "I can't. You aren't the one who's about to die.", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "What if I told you you don't need to die?"}
{3: 'With the sound of a machine running, the speaker who has been hiding in the shadows of the rubble appears on the rooftop and sits next to Lamia.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "No way. I'm not strong enough, and it doesn't matter whether I choose to fight them head-on or run away, Gabriel and the Polyphage will still catch up to me and devour me in the end.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '421', 3: 'As an Ascendant... Are you really scared of death?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "I don't feel much, to be honest... Ascendants are usually driven by emotions stronger than their own lives, but wishes don't get fulfilled if we're dead.", 4: '1'}
{2: '421', 3: "And you do have one such wish yourself, no? One that's so strong that not even death can deter you...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Maybe, but I'm not going to tell you, because you're probably just going to sell it as a piece of information.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "But I hate the idea of dying a meaningless death, so I'm just going to try a little harder to stay alive until...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Hey! I almost fell for that... You're terrible!", 4: '1'}
{2: '421', 3: "I didn't do anything. You were the one who kept talking.", 4: '2'}
{2: '421', 3: "Back to what I was saying. If you fulfil my conditions, then I can help you walk away from Gabriel's war alive no matter who wins.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Hmm... How do I know if you'll live up to your promise? We do, as a matter of fact, belong to different sides.", 4: '1'}
{2: '421', 3: "I'm a dealer, and trust is of utmost importance in a deal.", 4: '2'}
{2: '421', 3: "And you don't have a choice. Otherwise you wouldn't have come all the way to see me, no?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "This is super bad... Having to live under someone else's protection.", 4: '1'}
{2: '421', 3: "This isn't too different from when you first started working for Luna.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Uhh? How do you know something from so long ago?', 4: '1'}
{2: '421', 3: 'There is no secret here.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The little robot looks away from a silent Lamia at the surging Red Tide over the horizon in the distance.'}
{2: '421', 3: "Don't sweat it. The conditions aren't overly difficult.", 4: '2'}
{2: '421', 3: "And you won't need to worry about Luna getting suspiciousâ€”if that's something you still worry about at all, that is.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: '...Are you always this pushy with women?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Well then... What should I do exactly?', 4: '1'}
{2: '421', 3: 'I want the "key" that can cause the lake to flood.', 4: '2'}
